overview.business_description: Swedish premium car manufacturer. Subsidiary of Geely Auto. Focus on safety, sustainability, and electrification. Targets all-electric by 2030. Also holds stake in Polestar.
business_positives: Strong brand in safety and sustainability
Aggressive EV strategy with clear targets
Geely ownership provides scale and technology
overview.fatal_flaw: EV transition execution risk; competition intensifying in premium EV; Polestar losses; China exposure
overview.recent_news: Progressing EV transition. Polestar stake creates volatility. Targeting fully electric lineup by 2030.

credit_opinion.summary: Volvo Car maintains investment grade ratings reflecting its premium brand position and Geely backing. EV transition is progressing but execution remains key. Polestar stake adds complexity.
key_risks: Competition from Tesla and legacy premium OEMs
credit_opinion.recommendation: NEUTRAL - Investment grade but EV execution risk
